synopsis.text: Magical girl enthusiasts and aspiring idols, Urara, Hanabi, and Inaho, embark on a mission to captivate the hearts of Japan by creating an anime centered around themselves! Determined to appeal to both children and adults alike, they adopt the ever-popular magical girl theme. As they dive into the world of Naria, a once-flourishing land now plagued by an endless winter, the girls transform into magical warriors tasked with defeating the nefarious Ice Queen. However, the idols-turned-heroes find it challenging to fully embrace their roles, as they juggle their dreams of stardom with their on-screen responsibilities. Will they rise to the occasion and save Naria, or will their comedic escapades steal the spotlight? Join Urara, Hanabi, and Inaho on their magical, laughter-filled adventure in this one-cour anime extravaganza!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
